meanings.definition: A girl or young woman who delivers newspapers.
meanings.sent1: The papergirls ride their bikes to deliver newspapers every morning.
meanings.sent2: I saw the papergirls chatting while on their paper route.
meanings.sent3: The papergirls accidentally delivered newspapers to the wrong houses and caused a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The papergirls are like the town's messengers, spreading news to every doorstep.
meanings.sent5: The image of the papergirls on their bicycles is a nostalgic sight for many.

meanings.definition: The plural form of papergirl, referring to multiple girls who deliver newspapers.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the papergirls gather at the corner to start their deliveries.
meanings.sent2: The papergirls work together efficiently to ensure all newspapers are delivered on time.
meanings.sent3: The papergirls formed a club where they discuss their experiences while delivering newspapers.
meanings.sent4: In the neighborhood, the papergirls are known for their punctuality and friendly smiles.
meanings.sent5: The papergirls' teamwork and dedication make them an essential part of the community.
